evidence: pathlib.Path added in Python 3.4 → min Python 3.4
time.clock removed in Python 3.8 → max Python 3.7

notes: Notes: 1) Standard library APIs were used to determine Python version range. 2) External package versions inferred based on API introduction/removal. Confidence ranges from 0.0-1.0 (higher is more confident). 3) Unable to determine version range for PIL due to lack of API usage information.
